test.name: SETUP TASKS - DATADRIVER BLOCKCHAIN EXPLORER : Get verified smart contracts for address 0x29844D24b3Fb73bED90Db8922d411f5a063AC7D5 and log the contract information from the polygonscan.com Mainnet blockchain explorer.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Download Deployed Contract From Explorer
kw.msg: Human-readable Ethereum smart contract file created: downloaded-deployed-contracts/polygon-contract1.sol
kw.doc: Downloads Solidity source code of verified contracts from EVM blockchain Mainnet or Testnet explorers. Creates a human readable Solidity file with a name (your-contract-name.sol) that you provide. Un-verified smart contracts will not work with the EVM blockchain explorer APIs. This keyword could theoretically work with any EVM blockchain explorer that is designed like Etherscan. This keyword requires a valid Etherscan, Polygonscan (or similar) API key etc.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Get Contract Creation Information
kw.doc: Get Contract Creator and Creation Tx Hash from the explorer API, then return the data as JSON. This keyword could theoretically work with any EVM blockchain explorer that is designed like Etherscan. This keyword requires a valid Etherscan, Polygonscan (or similar) API key etc.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

Remove Files

kw.doc: Copies specified files to the target directory.

test.name: SETUP TASKS - DATADRIVER SOLIDITY FILE UPDATER : Update the contract polygon-contract1.sol to have the same Solidity version as the other files.

kw.name: Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.

kw.name: Replace String Using Regexp
kw.doc: Replaces ``pattern`` in the given ``string`` with ``replace_with``.

kw.name: Create File
kw.doc: Creates a file with the given content and encoding.

kw.name: Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.

kw.name: Replace String Using Regexp
kw.doc: Replaces ``pattern`` in the given ``string`` with ``replace_with``.

kw.name: Create File
kw.doc: Creates a file with the given content and encoding.

kw.name: Remove Multi Line Comments From Solidity File
Remove Multi Line Solidity Comments
kw.doc: Removes multi-line Solidity comments commonly starting with '/**' and ending with '*/'. Uses the Python regular expression module in the standard library.

kw.name: Remove Single Line Comments From Solidity File
Remove Single Line Solidity Comments
kw.doc: Removes single-line Solidity comments commonly starting with '//'. Uses the Python regular expression module in the standard library.
